channel.title: Perfect 525 with HD and LD option
channel.description:
Today i'm on a devotion to make a 100% perfect 525 using a 508 base and client and optional HD in it.
I'm going to use Espeon's Source and i'm still looking for a 508 HD client without an antileech(lol)
I've spent hours making vesta statius spirit shields and pvp drop items such as ancient stat models, and i'm finally finished and ready to inject them into my client.
Now this server is going to be 100% perfect not 1 interface or feature not 100% working thriving for perfection.
[img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4403/29322781.png[/img]-Real RS Like PvP drops [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4403/29322781.png[/img]-A very well done combat training and exp rate [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4403/29322781.png[/img]-Trade system and player following 100% working no Noclip following [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4403/29322781.png[/img]-Summoning 100% working [img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/9344/38931425.png[/img]-Npc animations 100% working like RS [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4403/29322781.png[/img]-Every minigame the server has interfaces for working 100% [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4403/29322781.png[/img]-Accurate quests not too hard not too easy. [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4403/29322781.png[/img]-Skilling, Every skill will be working 100% with decent exp rates [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4403/29322781.png[/img]-Shops for basic needs, including 1 or two general stores.
Now please remember this is only day one, i will post pictures and progress up as soon as i find a client, if you know of one it would be appreciated to share.
Once i'm done with this server and client i will make a public download, I don't see many servers like this anymore.

item.title: Perfect 525 with HD and LD option
item.dc:creator: @Imnotwelcomed Imnotwelcomed
item.description:
@Imnotwelcomed wrote:

Today i’m on a devotion to make a 100% perfect 525 using a 508 base and client and optional HD in it.

I’m going to use Espeon’s Source and i’m still looking for a 508 HD client without an antileech(lol)

I’ve spent hours making vesta statius spirit shields and pvp drop items such as ancient stat models, and i’m finally finished and ready to inject them into my client.

Now this server is going to be 100% perfect not 1 interface or feature not 100% working thriving for perfection.

-Real RS Like PvP drops
-A very well done combat training and exp rate
-Trade system and player following 100% working no Noclip following
-Summoning 100% working
-Npc animations 100% working like RS
-Every minigame the server has interfaces for working 100%
-Accurate quests not too hard not too easy.
-Skilling, Every skill will be working 100% with decent exp rates
-Shops for basic needs, including 1 or two general stores.

Now please remember this is only day one, i will post pictures and progress up as soon as i find a client, if you know of one it would be appreciated to share.

Once i’m done with this server and client i will make a public download, I don’t see many servers like this anymore.

Read full topic
